PHOTOS ADDED BELOW I am currently looking to sell my T-200 Fatima Team set individually or as a whole.  I have all 16.  Here's the rundown:

Chicago Americans SGC 30 SOLD
St Louis Nationals SGC A  SOLD
Boston Americans SGC 40  SOLD
Philadelphia Americans A  SOLD
New York Americans SGC 10 Tough card  SOLD
Brooklyn Nationals SGC A  SOLD
St Louis Americans SGC 10  SOLD
Chicago Nationals SGC 30  SOLD
New York Nationals SGC 30  SOLD
Cincinnati Nationals SGC 10  SOLD
Boston Nationals SGC 35 Tough card  SOLD
Washington Americans SGC A  SOLD
Pittsburgh Nationals SGC 40  SOLD
Detroit Americans SGC A  SOLD
Philadelphia Nationals SGC 30  SOLD
Cleveland Americans SGC A  SOLD

$5 for shipping.  Paypal f/f and checks accepted.   If you would like for me to email any pictures, please just message me.  Thanks for looking.  Dave
Prices added.  Please feel free to let me know if you want to be emailed pics.  Thanks! Dave
Could I get a pic of the Cincinnati card?  thanks!
PM sent on the St. Louis Cards.
Just now sending scans to everyone.  Sorry for the delay!

I received the first batch of 3 from David today. Very satisfied. Packed well. Shipped promptly. Somebody buy the rest of these to get the candy out of my face!!!!

Mark
Thanks for the endorcement Mark. Glad you are happy.
Agree with Mark on this one.  Finished my set with the purchase of the Detroit and NY Americans.  Very fast shipping and great communication.  Thanks, Dave, for an excellent transaction!
Where are all my Boston fans???  I have lowered the 2 Boston cards.  These 2 cards present the best out of all the cards I had!
